translation.en: Calling all trains!
translation.es: UNA SERIE ORIGINAL DE NETFLIX ¡Atención, trenes!

translation.en: ♪ All aboard, let's make tracks ♪ ♪ Mighty Express ♪
♪ Mighty strong and mighty fast ♪
♪ Mighty, Mighty Express ♪
♪ Put our crew to the test ♪ ♪ Mighty Express ♪
♪ It's mighty time ♪
♪ All aboard, we're on our way ♪ ♪ Mighty fast to save the day ♪
translation.es: Vamos con velocidad, pues el día hay que salvar.

translation.en: ♪ Mega mission to the max ♪
♪ Let's make tracks ♪
♪ Mighty Express ♪♪
[Nate] Mighty trains race!
♪ Delivering balls to the kids at school ♪ ♪ Kids at school, kids at school ♪
translation.es: Hay muchas pelotas por entregar, entregar, entregar.

translation.en: ♪ Loads to play with and it's super cool ♪ ♪ Super cool ♪♪
translation.es: Los chicos en la escuela van a jugar, a jugar.

translation.en: Chugga-chugga zoom!
Where's he going in such a hurry?
Let's follow him and find out. Maybe we can be tricky!
translation.es: Sigámoslo y averigüémoslo. Podríamos ser sucios.

translation.en: [singing] And sneaky!
Jazz hands!
[Ricky] Fastest bullet train, coming through!
[Nate] Approaching School Station!
translation.es: Me acerco a la Estación de la escuela.

translation.en: [Nate] I've got a delivery of bouncy balls!
Ooh, ooh! Did my special volleyball come?
I think so. Let's see!
Yes! You're the best, Nate! And your extend-o car's totally awesome!
translation.es: ¡Sí! ¡Eres el mejor, Nate! ¡Y tu vagón extensible es increíble!

translation.en: [Stella] That explendo-bendo car thingy is kinda awesome!
translation.es: Ese vagón extensible es bastante increíble.

translation.en: Really awesome! Now what are they doing?
Ah! Giant furry thingy! Ugh...
Why do animals love us so much? No respect for privacy.
translation.es: ¿Por qué los animales nos aman? No respetan la privacidad.

translation.en: Totally.
-Oh, hi, Red! -Hi, Nate!
I'm just here to make sure the balls get delivered in a safe and orderly manner.
translation.es: Vine a asegurarme de que las pelotas llegaran bien.

translation.en: What could go wrong? I'll unload them!
Wait, Nate, those containers are too big to pick up at the same time!
translation.es: ¡Espera! Son muy grandes. No los recojas juntos.

translation.en: Nah, I've got it!
It's the end of the world!
Switching hose car from water to air!
translation.es: Cambiaré el vagón de agua a aire.

translation.en: Rescue Red to the rescue!
Halt, balls!
Not today, ball!
Gotcha!
[Ricky] Ooh, that train car Red has is cool, too.
translation.es: El vagón de Red también es genial.

translation.en: It sure is! We should have cool train cars like that!
translation.es: Sí. Deberíamos tener vagones así de geniales.

translation.en: Phew! Thanks, Red!
Happy to help, Jaden.
-[microphone feedback] -Calling all trains!
Please report to the Busy Board for today's Mega Mission!
translation.es: Todos a la Estación de tareas para la megamisión.

translation.en: [both] It's Mighty Time!
Hm... I have an idea! Head to Mission Station, Ricky.
translation.es: ¡Tengo una idea! Ve a la Estación de tareas.

translation.en: I have a sneaky way to trick Nate, and get all their cargo cars for us!
translation.es: Hay una forma embustera de engañar a Nate y llevarnos todos sus vagones.

translation.en: Sneaky and tricky?!
Those are my two favourite words!
[singing] It's tricky time!
Today's Mega Mission goes to...
translation.es: La megamisión de hoy es para…

translation.en: -[Max] Freight Nate! -Chugga-chugga zoom!
[Max] You'll pick up feed for the farm animals at Port Station
translation.es: Llevarás alimento de la Estación del puerto

translation.en: and deliver it to Farm Station.
Freight Nate is never late! Because I go fast, fast, faster!
translation.es: ¡Nate Carga nunca se retrasa! ¡Porque voy rápido, rápido, más rápido!

translation.en: You think you're faster than me?
-Where did you come from? -We snuck in. Very sneaky!
translation.es: ¿De dónde salieron? Nos colamos. De forma embustera.

translation.en: So, think you could beat me in a race?
-Yeah! -Uh, Nate?
-Wanna race me? -Yeah!
And whoever wins gets to keep all the Mighty Express cargo cars?
translation.es: ¿El ganador se lleva todos sus vagones?

translation.en: Yeah! Wait, no!
Too late! It worked just like you said it would, Stella!
-[giggles] Very sneaky. -That's my name!
You heard Nate! We're racing!
Whichever train picks up the animal feed and delivers it to Farm Station first is the winner!
translation.es: Ganará el primero que recoja el alimento y lo entregue a la Estación de la granja.

translation.en: And when I win, Stella and I get all your cargo cars!
translation.es: Cuando gane, Stella y yo tendremos todos sus vagones.

translation.en: All the cargo cars?! Not good, very bad!
And without my digger car, how can I, well... dig?
translation.es: Sin mi vagón excavador, no podré excavar.

translation.en: And without my animal car, how can the Popstar Piggies get to their concerts?
translation.es: Sin el mío, los Cerditos Superestrellas no podrán dar conciertos.

translation.en: They have a lot of concerts, y'all.
You two tricked Nate. That wasn't fair.
translation.es: ¡Engañaron a Nate! Eso no fue justo.

translation.en: It's okay, Max, I've got this!
I can beat Ricky with one wheel tied behind my caboose!
translation.es: Puedo vencer a Lucio con una rueda atada incluso.

translation.en: You guys believe in me, right?
Of course we do, Nate.
We've always got your back. It's just, are you sure you want to race?
translation.es: Siempre te apoyamos. ¿Seguro que quieres competir?

translation.en: Yes! I'm going to win!
Okay... the race is on!
But when Nate does win, you two have to feed all the farm animals!
translation.es: Pero cuando Nate gane, alimentarán a todos los animales.

translation.en: -All the farm an-- -Deal!
Wait, what?!
Okay, then, Nate, Ricky, now it's time to...
translation.es: Bien, Nate, Lucio. Es hora de…

translation.en: -Clean up. -Tune up.
-Hook up! -To the beat of my sweet track!
♪ It's time to clean up ♪
♪ It's time to tune up ♪
♪ It's time to hook up ♪ ♪ Mighty Express ♪
It's wash time! Break it down!
♪ Scrub-a-dub-dub ♪ ♪ Scrub, scrub-a-dub-dub ♪
♪ Scrub-a-dub-dub-dub ♪
♪ Scrub-a-dub-dub ♪
That tickles!
♪ Scrub-a-dub-dub-dub-dub ♪
♪ It's time to clean up ♪ ♪ It's time to tune up ♪
translation.es: Es hora de limpiar. Es hora de ajustar.

translation.en: [Liza] This is an extra special race tune-up!
♪ Mighty Express ♪♪
Bye!
You are both Liza-certified racers!
[Max] And now it's time to hook up... with your racer cargo cars!
translation.es: Hora de enganchar sus nuevos vagones de carrera.

translation.en: Ricky has Stella with him to help, so I'll ride along with you, Nate!
translation.es: Stella ayudará a Lucio. Iré contigo, Nate.

translation.en: [Max] Now we're ready to...
[Nico] Not start yet!
Because you can't have a race without announcers!
translation.es: Porque no puede haber una carrera sin anunciadores.

translation.en: Nate and Ricky, report to the starting line!
translation.es: Nate y Lucio, acérquense a la línea de partida.

translation.en: This is it! The Main Train Event!
translation.es: Bienvenidos al evento principal de trenes.

translation.en: [Nico] The first ever Tracksville race is about to begin!
translation.es: ¡Comenzará la primera carrera de Pista Férrea!

translation.en: So get ready to choo-choo!
The first train to deliver the animal feed to Farm Station
translation.es: El primer tren que lleve el alimento a la estación

translation.en: will be the Mightiest Race Champion!
translation.es: será el campeón de esta supercarrera.

translation.en: On your marks!
Get set...
[Stella] Go!
-Go! -Go!
[giggles] This is gonna be easy! [singing] Oh, yeah!
Jazz hands!
[Nate honks] Chugga-chugga zoom! See you at the finish line, Ricky!
translation.es: ¡Chu, chu, zum! Te veo en la meta, Lucio.

translation.en: -Huh? -Step on it!
And they're off! Nate jumps out to an early lead!
Ricky's going to have to chugga-chugga and choo-choo if he wants to beat Nate!
translation.es: Lucio tendrá que hacer un gran chu, chu para vencer a Nate.

translation.en: We can catch up! We just need a sneaky shortcut!
translation.es: Podremos alcanzarlo con un atajo embustero.

translation.en: One tricky shortcut coming up!
Hurry, before anyone sees!
It worked! We're ahead of Nate!
[Stella] Now, for part two.
I'll switch those signs!
Now, Nate will drive into the swamp, instead of going to Port Station!
translation.es: Nate irá al pantano en vez de a la Estación del puerto.

translation.en: Very sneaky!
And tricky!
-[uptempo music playing] -I'm Stella!
I'm Ricky!
I'm sneaky!
I'm tricky!
-I'm sneakier! -I'm the trickiest!
translation.es: Soy más embustera. ¡Soy el más sucio!

translation.en: Huh. I thought Port Station was the other way. Me too.
translation.es: - Creí que era al revés. - Yo también.

translation.en: -Maybe we should-- -Well, the sign can't be wrong!
translation.es: - Quizá… - La señal no está mal.

translation.en: The sign was wrong!
Stop, Nate, before you get stuck in the swamp!
I won't get stuck.
I can go right through it, because I'm super fast and super strong!
translation.es: Puedo atravesarlo porque soy superrápido y superfuerte.

translation.en: Fast, fast, faster!
[Nico] We're coming to you live from the finish line at Farm Station
translation.es: Estamos en vivo desde la línea de meta en la granja.

translation.en: and it looks like Nate's in a very sticky situation...
translation.es: Parece que Nate está en una situación pegajosa.

translation.en: Because he's stuck!
[man] Last time on "The Eggs of Our Lives."
translation.es: En Los huevos de nuestras vidas…

translation.en: -Sorry chickens, we need to see the race. -[clucking]
translation.es: Lo siento, debemos ver la carrera.

translation.en: You can get out of the swamp, Nate! -[Liza] We believe in you! -[grunting continues]
translation.es: Puedes salir del pantano, Nate. Creemos en ti.

translation.en: I can't back out.
Oh! I know what to do! Mega stabilizer legs, activate!
Nice save! But I told you we'd get stuck.
Nothing to worry about, Max!
I had it covered. And now we're back in the race!
Those signs must have gotten switched somehow.
[Nate] There!
Time to chugga-chugga zoom!
[Ricky] Approaching Port Station!
translation.es: Me acerco a la Estación del puerto.

translation.en: -[dolphin trilling] -Hi, Tippers!
Ahoy!
Oh, and ahoy! Wow, the rare "double ahoy!"
translation.es: ¡Y ahoy! El doble ahoy no pasa seguido.

translation.en: What?! Hey! How'd you get here so fast? You should be stuck in the swamp!
translation.es: ¿Qué? ¿Cómo llegaste tan rápido? Deberías estar en el pantano.

translation.en: Uh... I mean, uh, stuck in second place!
How'd you know about the swamp?
[both] Lucky guess?
Your cargo's ready to cruise on out of here!
translation.es: La carga está lista para zarpar.

translation.en: [Skipper] You each get two giant bags of animal feed.
translation.es: Sus dos bolsas gigantes de alimento.

translation.en: Me first!
-Thanks, Dipper! -It's Skipper!
Gotta go, I've got a race to win!
translation.es: Debo irme para ganar la carrera.

translation.en: -Thanks, Skipper! -It's Skipper!
Oh, wait. That's what he said.
You're welcome!
[Nico] Stage one of the Mightiest Race is done! And Ricky's ahead by a nose!
translation.es: Acabó la primera etapa de la carrera y Lucio lleva la delantera.

translation.en: [Nico] But will he maintain his lead?
Will Nate get stuck again?
-[Nico] So many questions! -[bleating]
Chickens!
And Tricky Ricky is in the lead!
And remember, if Ricky wins he gets... [gulp] ...all the Mighty Express train cars!
translation.es: Recuerden: si Lucio gana, se llevará todos los vagones de Mighty Express.

translation.en: [Stella gasps] Nate's gaining on us! You've gotta go faster, Ricky!
Or be trickier!
Even Nate can't outrun an avalanche.
He's been tricked by Tricky Ricky!
[singing] And Sneaky Stella! Jazz hands!
Nate's headed straight for an avalanche!
Big trouble! I can't watch!
Nate! Watch out, avalanche!
No problem! I can bat those boulders away with my grabber claw!
translation.es: Descuida. Batearé esas rocas con mi garra.

translation.en: There are way too many! You have to dodge them.
Time for some boulder batting! Mega grabber claw, activate!
Boom! Home run! The crowd goes wild for Nate!
I knew there were too many to stop.
Nate! Use your stabilizer legs to push us out of here!
Maybe I can use my stabilizer legs to get us out!
Mega stabilizer legs, activate!
Up and over! Bye-bye, boulders!
And Nate's made it past the boulders!
He did?!
He did! Yes! Woo-hoo!
Huzzah!
[giggles] I mean, uh, I mean... -Excellent work, racer. -[giggling]
Nice job, Nate. But next time, try listening to me.
translation.es: Bien hecho, Nate. La próxima vez, escúchame y quizá evitemos más problemas.

translation.en: Maybe we'll avoid any more track trouble.
translation.es: La próxima vez, escúchame y quizá evitemos más problemas.

translation.en: It's alright, we're back in the race! Chugga-chugga zoom!
translation.es: Descuida, volvimos a la carrera. ¡Chu, chu, zum!

translation.en: We're in the lead! Oh, yeah!
[both] ♪ We're gonna win the race ♪ ♪ Yes we are ♪ ♪ We're gonna win every cargo car ♪
translation.es: La carrera vamos a ganar. Los vagones vamos a robar.

translation.en: ♪ And then Mighty Express Will be second best ♪
♪ To the Stella and Ricky superstars ♪ ♪ To the Ricky and Stella superstars ♪
translation.es: Las superestrellas Lucio y Stella vencerán.

translation.en: Yes! I'm catching up!
Oh, no! The avalanche didn't stop him!
Time to kick it into overdrive.
translation.es: Es hora de ir a toda máquina.

translation.en: Nate, you need to hit your brakes! That turn is too sharp, you're gonna--
translation.es: Nate, ¡debes frenar! Ese giro es muy cerrado. Vas a…

translation.en: Win the race! That's what I'm gonna do!
Whoa!
Oh, no! Nate's derailed!
[Stella] See you at the finish line!
-[monitor chiming] -Nate, Max, come in! Are you okay?!
[sighs] Yeah, we're okay. But I should've listened to Max about that turn. And the boulders. And the swamp.
translation.es: Sí, pero debí escuchar a Max sobre el giro, las rocas y el pantano.

translation.en: [sighs] Now Ricky and Stella are gonna win the race, and everyone's gonna lose their cargo cars.
translation.es: Lucio y Stella ganarán y todos perderán sus vagones.

translation.en: And it's all my fault, because I didn't listen!
The race isn't over until someone crosses the finish line. You can still win!
translation.es: Todavía no cruzaron la meta. Aún puedes ganar.

translation.en: You're right, Max! But not listening to you keeps getting me in trouble.
translation.es: Es cierto, Max. Pero no oírte me mete en problemas.

translation.en: So what should I do, Max, buddy?
If you use your stabilizer legs to jump toward that rock,
translation.es: Si saltas hacia esa roca con tus estabilizadores

translation.en: then grab it with your grabber claw, you might be able to swing us back up.
translation.es: y luego la sujetas con tu garra, quizá puedas subirnos.

translation.en: But you'll have to listen closely.
Chugga-chugga can do!
Mega grabber claw, activate!
Hold on tight! Here we go!
Grab it...
...now!
Chugga-chugga swing!
-Woo-hoo! -Awesome!
I wanna do that again! [chuckling]
[chuckles] Maybe another time!
We've got a race to win!
With Nate stuck on that ledge, we can take it nice and slow, and still win!
translation.es: Con Nate atascado en el barranco, podemos ir despacio y aun así ganar.

translation.en: Racing is so easy!
Hi! Bye!
Oh. Hi, Nate.
[both] Nate?! Go! Go! Go!
We're approaching the rope bridge!
You need to slow down when you go over it, so you don't derail again.
translation.es: Ve más despacio para no descarrilar.

translation.en: I'm listening to all your advice.
[singing] See you later!
Ricky, you're going too fast! It's not safe!
translation.es: Lucio, vas muy rápido. No es seguro.

translation.en: You're not gonna trick me! That's my job!
translation.es: No intentes ser sucio. Eso es lo mío.

translation.en: So... maybe Nate wasn't trying to trick me.
translation.es: Quizá Nate no intentaba ser sucio.

translation.en: Hang on, I'm coming!
[Nate] Gotcha!
Phew! Thanks, Nate.
I know we're racing against each other, but I just want to say, from the bottom of my wheels...
translation.es: Sé que competimos, pero quiero decirte desde el fondo de ruedas…

translation.en: See you at the finish line!
translation.es: que nos vemos en la meta.

translation.en: [giggles] You've been tricked... -[Nate coughing] -...by Tricky Ricky!
And Sneaky Stella! Jazz hands!
-That really was tricky! -And sneaky!
translation.es: Eso fue muy sucio. Y embustero.

translation.en: [both] That's our name!
Now I really, really, really want to win!
translation.es: Ahora sí que realmente quiero ganar.

translation.en: To the max!
Yeah! No way they're gonna get our cargo cars.
Chugga-chugga win!
[Nico] This is it! They're in the final stretch!
translation.es: ¡Ya casi acaba! La recta final. Lucio tiene la delantera.

translation.en: It's Ricky in the lead. Now, it's Nate coming in from behind!
translation.es: La recta final. Lucio tiene la delantera. Ahora la tiene Nate. Ahora Lucio. ¡Ahora Nate!

translation.en: [Nico] Now Ricky! Now Nate!
translation.es: Ahora la tiene Nate. Ahora Lucio. ¡Ahora Nate!

translation.en: [Nico and Liza] Ricky! Nate! Ricky! Nate! Ricky! Nate!
translation.es: Lucio, Nate. Lucio, Nate. Lucio, Nate.

translation.en: [Liza] Look, here they come!
This is gonna be close! Goodbye sweet, sweet cargo cars!
Huh?
Ricky's winning!
[all chanting] Go, Nate, go! Go, Nate, go!
-[trains] Go, Nate, go! -[Milo] Come on, Nate, you've got this!
Now that's something I love to hear!
-I'm not letting my friends down! -[revving]
[Nate and Max] Oh, yeah!
-[crowd cheering] -[Milo] Good job, Nate!
Done and delivered!
Yeah! You did it!
We get to keep all our cargo cars!
Yee-haw!
-[Red] Well done, Nate! -[Milo] Well done, Nate! Woo-hoo!
You did it, Nate! You won!
Thanks, Max. I couldn't've done it without listening to you.
translation.es: Gracias, Max. Gané porque te escuché.

translation.en: I can't believe we didn't win.
You know what that means!
Yeah! It means we're getting outta here!
translation.es: Sí, significa que los largamos de aquí.

translation.en: [Red] Not so fast!
As official race safety expert and rule keeper,
translation.es: Como experto en seguridad y reglas,

translation.en: it is my duty to remind you that you must now keep the promise you made at the start of the race!
translation.es: les recuerdo que deben cumplir la promesa que hicieron al inicio de la carrera.

translation.en: In other words, y'all got some critters to feed!
Okay, we can help!
Ah! Stop dancing on me!
Chicken on my head, chicken on my head!
